attributes.action: Make First Great Western recycle on all their trains
attributes.additional_details:
First Great Western carries on average 2.5 Billion U.K Passengers a year and they don't recycle on any of there trains.

Making adjusted operating profit of £457.4 Million I think you have a social and ethical responsibility to cleaning up their act and encourage their customers to recycle by providing the facilities to do so.

Please Sign and Share
